column5: My place is close to restaurants and dining, family-friendly activities, and nightlife. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the location, the ambiance, and the views. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. This listing is for a master bedroom with a huge walk-in closet, bath tub, separate shower, 2 sinks, TV with lots of cable channels, writing desk / chair and dresser. Guests also have access to kitchen, dining room, living room, area pool, gym and tennis courts.
